Blog.post: hmm... very long never include article le... yest muggin for bio test, actually not really mug lahx... i noe most of the questions... so jus memo the answer, dun really noe how to do the test thou... haha....anyway its over... today woke up at 3 plus... called ww at 4am, he nv answer lor... so dun care la... smsed him... anyway. now i m in the LEP room den decided to include an article lor... ahaz.... wadeva... tmr got chinese test, haven study!!! die ... hai ...

hMm.... sitting in my rm now... damn bored .. cuz today in school feelin unwell, feel kinda giddy and felt like puking ... damn... wth is happening... Ian approached me today.. asked me hell lot of questions... how m i supposed to reply??? ... quitting is not m decision.. but i dun haf a choice .. do i?? iAn ... iF u r readin tis, i regret to say that i haf already made my decision... or ... my quitting has already been decided... we can still b frens cant we??? hm... great noeing u for the past few months.. den jus now watched sunyanzi de concert vcd... BORING.. but no choice lahx.. buy le mus watch (: i stil ike her as much even after the boring concert.. tink she has become sexier.. wOohOo... okay.. now lets see.. i dunno when tat event happened, but she was my pri school mate last time.. we weren't exactly close.. but the thing is she remembers me and i remember her lo... its fate that brouight us to NY and she has became so pretty... a princess... however, it never occured to me that i actually fell for her, until i cant get her outa my head... tinkin bout her day and night... hoW~~!!! haiz... sian.. the thing is i m not supposed to even tink bout her, much less fall in luv with her... she is not exactly the usual kind of a girl... lets say.. she liks girls... get it?? guess u all noe who she is le ba... hai... CANT hELp fAllin In lOve... ): wishing and hoppin the day will come when she 'wakes up' and we could start a new chapter in our lives... tat's a wish lerhx...

today took MC, stayed home the whole day sia... tried to study 3D trigo, the more i study, the more i find it difficult damn.... buden on the whole quite a meaningful day larx... i tink~! morning my mum called mr bong.. he crapped alot, dun feel like mentioning here... but ... i will remember it foreva ~~!~! so insulting lorx... damn ... den after realisin 3D damn diff, sms~ed weiwen ask him teach me,... den he sms say he damn depressed... feel lik abandoned child blah blah... first time see him so stressed sia hahaz... anyway... gave him some advice ahhaz... say he caught the JJ bug... cuz tat was wad i felt last week lerhx.. hmm... alot of test comin... damn sian... haven recover yet lorx... but no choice.. tink i end here today... OOH i forgot,,, i quitting tennis, as much as i dun wan to, i duno haf a choice.. studies more important, thou vanessa warned me and i noe i will live to regret it, i will still play, with less sstress and show that tupid fat indian man wad i m made off ... AHHAZ... nitex ...

Hai, today sick, puked again jus now,… den was lik soo soo soo disappointed that my old blog was gone.. GONE~!!! … sad sad… tis morning was told to decide between tennis and biology. Cuz I really cant cope with the stressful environment, that’s y I sick mahx… wad to do … haven decided… ww say drop tennis, but sarah said to hang on … duno lahx… dilemma… DILEMMA>>. yEsterday GP test sux... was so shocked... damn difficult.. hai sad... den afternoon went oUt wIth weIweN, actually i go home le... cuz he nv sms me... at 3 he sms me ... so wE go lIb sTudy, den mEt gUAn zHEn, sinting and desmond... very long nv see guan zhen le... stil the same thou ahhaz... den ww rEacH le tHe liB goNNA clOSe le... wth lor... aFter taat wE gO lIngEr aRound .. dEn dEcidED to go Long jOhn study ... since no $$, we share a drink lor.... it costs $2.45 so expensive... its so sweet right?.. my foot lor.. he drank most of it las... while i shredd the cover of the drink ...hmm.... but qUite mEaningfUL.. hAhA...
